mapper.select: select ma.id,ma.name,ma.plan_id,ma.content,ma.location,ma.form,ma.start_time,ma.end_time,ma.estimated_cost,ma.actual_cost,e.username,ma.manager_id,e.name as managername,ma.activity_status,ats.activity_status_name,ma.create_time from marketing_activities ma join activity_status as ats on ma.activity_status =ats.activity_status_id join employees e on ma.manager_id = e.id
